GalaxyDefenders

Class Bullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.gridworld.actor.Actor
      • GalaxyDefenders.Bullet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PoweredBullet

    public class Bullet
extends info.gridworld.actor.Actor
    The Bullet class gives functionality to the bullets that are shot out by the sprite. Bullet extends the Actor class. The bullets use actual images that we found online and are not drawn by the program.
    Version:
    May 25, 2015
    Author:
    Ben Liang, Period: 4, Assignment: GridworldFinal, Sources: None

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        Moves if it can move. If the bullet goes off the screen, it is removed from the grid. If it makes contact with an alien, the alien and bullet are both removed from the grid. The bullet moves by a grid every 10th of a second, using the timer.
        Overrides:
        act in class info.gridworld.actor.Actor

      • move

        public void move()
        Moves the bullet forward.

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove()
        Tests whether the bullet can move forward into a location that is empty or contains an alien.
        Returns:
        true if this bullet can move.
